CustomField.description: Whether or not ITR, and it's associated workflows, is enabled for this number.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ITR automates opt-out tracking, routing to agent queues(via Omnichannel),case creation,off-hour handling and other interactions.Review the Admin Guide for more info: http://www.heywire.com /resources/(Documentation tab)
CustomField.label: ITR Enabled
